dt: {bc}a person who does unskilled physical work for wages

shortdef: one that labors; specifically : a person who does unskilled physical work for wages

dt: {bc}one who works for daily wages especially as an unskilled laborer

shortdef: one who works for daily wages especially as an unskilled laborer

dt: {bc}work that is done by enslaved people or by people who are treated as though they are enslaved

dt.t: prisoners being forced to do {it}slave labor{/it}
The pyramids were built by {it}slave labor{/it}.

utxt.t: … The Statue of Freedom—the figure of a Native American woman warrior that stands on the dome—was cast in bronze by {wi}slave laborers{/wi} in 1863 and hoisted up there.

shortdef: work that is done by enslaved people or by people who are treated as though they are enslaved
